title: Al Ain Mineral Water, 500ml, Pack of 24, Low Sodium, Balanced Minerals, Bottle

raw_desc: CHOOSE QUALITY, CHOOSE AL AIN: A balanced mineral composition to revitalize and nourish your body. Al Ain water contains the perfect balance of essential minerals, providing a uniquely soft and smooth taste. AL AIN WATER: With the right mineral balance, Al Ain bottled water is your ideal choice of hydration, offering reliable refreshment, revitalization, and nourishment for your body. YOUR IDEAL CHOICE OF HYDRATION: Known for its pure and refreshing taste, Al Ain bottled water is your go-to choice for hydration, wherever you go. AWARD-WINNING QUALITY: Known for its exceptional taste, Al Ain Water has earned prestigious awards and recognition both locally and internationally. 100% RECYCLABLE: Al Ain Bottles are designed with the environment in mind. We take pride in our sustainability efforts, ensuring that all our water bottles are 100% recyclable.

specifications.Storage Instructions: ‎Keep away from sunlight. Store in a cool and dry place.
